item.title: Raspberry Pi 2 - Part 3 : media center
item.author: Auteur
item.description: This entry is part 3 of 4 in the series Raspberry Pi Today we’ll talk about media center solutions for the Pis. Let’s go! Media Center Distribution One of the most common use of the Raspberry #Pi 2 is to build a media center out of it. In order to so, one have access to several different “tools”. Let’s do a quick presentation. #Raspbian This is a Linux, Debian based OS (aka distribution).
